snippet: The resignation of Mali’s leader paves the way for the country to name an interim president. The officers who seized power last month have agreed to return the country to democratic rule.
abstract: Mali's ousted president Amadou Toumani Toure, who has been in hiding since March 2012 coup, tenders resignation letter to country's new leaders through an emissary; move paves the way for Mali to name an interim president, as the officers who seized power agree to return the country to democratic rule.
lead_paragraph: The resignation of Mali’s leader paves the way for the country to name an interim president. The officers who seized power last month have agreed to return the country to democratic rule.

headline.seo: Mali President Amadou Toumani Touré Resigns After Coup
headline.main: Mali’s President, Ousted in Coup, Steps Down
headline.print_headline: Mali’s President, Ousted in Coup, Steps Down

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
